Verses: 1 eppiraayeem Kaatrai Meyndhu, Kondarkaatraip Pinthodarugiraan; Avan Naaldhorum Poiyaiyum Kettaiyum Varththikkappanni, Aseeriyarode Udanpadikkai Pannugiraan; Egipthukku Enney Kondupogappadugiradhu.
2 yoodhaavodum Karththarukku Vazhakku Irukkiradhu; Avar Yaakkobai Avan Vazhigalukkuththakkadhaaga Visaarikkappogiraar; Avan Kiriyaigalukkuththakkadhaaga Avanukku Needhiyai Sarikkattuvaar.
3 avan Thaayin Garppaththile Than Sagodharanudaiya Kudhikaalaip Pidiththaan, Than Belaththinaal Dhevanode Poraadinaan.
4 avan Thoodhanaanavarode Poraadi Merkondaan, Azhudhu Avarai Nokkik Kenjinaan; Beththelile Avar Avanaik Kandu Sandhiththu, Avvidaththilum Nammode Pesinaar.
5 karththaraagiya Avar Senaigalin Dhevan; Yegovaa Enbadhu Avarudaiya Naamasangeerththanam.
6 ippodhum Nee Un Dhevanidaththil Thirumbu; Dhayavaiyum Nyaayaththaiyum Kaikkondu, Idaividaamal Un Dhevanai Nambikkondiru.
7 avan Vyaabaari, Kallaththaraasu Avan Kaiyil Irukkiradhu; Aniyaayancheyya Virumbugiraan.
8 eppiraayeem: Naan Aisuvariyavaanaanen; Naan Porulai Sambaadhiththen; Naan Prayaasappattuth Thedina Ellaavatrilum Paavamaagiya Akkiramam Ennidaththil Kandupidikkappaduvadhillaiyendru Sollugiraan.

9 unnai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththuvandhadhu Mudharkondu Un Dhevanaagiya Karththaraayirukkira Naan, Pandigai Naatkalil Seyyappadugiradhupol, Thirumbavum Unnaik Koodaarangalil Thaabarikkappannuven.
10 appadiye Theerkkadharisigalode Sonnen; Naan Anegam Dharisanangalai Arulinen; Theerkkadharisigalaikkondu Uvamaigalaal Pesinen.
11 keeleyaadh Akkirama Sthalamo? Aam, Avargal Abaththaraanaargal; Kilkaalile Kaalaigalaip Paliyidugiraargal; Avargaludaiya Peedangal Vayalvarappugalilirukkira Karkuviyalgalaippol Irukkiradhu.
12 yaakkobu Seeriyaadhesaththukku Odippoi, Isravel Oru Pennukkaaga Oozhiyancheydhu, Oru Pennukkaaga Aadu Meyththaan.
13 karththar Oru Theerkkadharisiyaik Kondu Isravelai Egipthilirundhu Purappadappanninaar; Theerkkadharisiyinaal Kaakkappattaan.
14 eppiraayeemo Avarai Migavum Kobappaduththinaan; Aagaiyaal Avanudaiya Aandavar Avanudaiya Raththappazhigalai Avanmel Sumaththi, Avan Seydha Nindhaiyai Avanmel Thiruppuvaar.
